title: Wild Wonders @ Singapore Zoo
blurb: Let your knowledge of the animal kingdom shine!
description: Step into the wild as the Singapore Zoo transforms into a living, breathing game board. In Wild Wonders: The Ultimate Animal Showdown, your child becomes a wildlife strategist - choosing animal teammates, completing fun missions across the zoo, and building the ultimate trump card deck. It’s a high-energy, brain-boosting adventure packed with teamwork, critical thinking, and immersive animal discovery. Along the way, children tackle challenges focused on key survival traits like mobility, defence, hunting and foraging. From Orangutans that use tools to Sun Bears with foraging superpowers, your child will discover real animal abilities while having a blast outdoors and connecting with nature. The day ends in an ultimate final card battle - will strategy, smarts, and wild instincts lead their team to victory?
datetime_display: Sun Bears with foraging superpowers, your child will discover real animal abilities while having a blast outdoors and connecting with nature

title: Wild Wonders @ Singapore Zoo Package
blurb: Explore the wonders of wildlife at Singapore Zoo.
description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure at the Singapore Zoo with the Wild Wonders package. This package offers an immersive experience into the animal kingdom, allowing families and children to discover fascinating facts about various species and their habitats. Engage in interactive exhibits, educational talks, and captivating animal encounters. Perfect for kids aged 3 to 12, this experience fosters a love for nature and wildlife conservation. The package includes guided tours and exclusive access to certain areas of the zoo, ensuring a memorable and enriching visit for the whole family. Discover the magic of wildlife and create lasting memories at the Singapore Zoo.

title: Wild Wonders Programme at Singapore Zoo
blurb: Develop critical thinking and deepen animal knowledge.
description: The Wild Wonders programme aims to develop critical thinking through strategic decision-making. It deepens knowledge of animal adaptations and behaviours. It strengthens collaboration and teamwork through group-based play. It also sharpens communication and social skills. The programme helps children grow in empathy for animals and the natural world. It encourages expressing creativity by designing their own animal with survival traits. This programme is designed to be family-friendly and engaging for children interested in animals and nature.

title: Exploring Singapore Zoo
blurb: Explore famous and hidden exhibits while completing challenges!
description: Explore famous and hidden exhibits while completing fun challenges to earn Trump cards! The Ultimate Animal Showdown With their collected cards, children will enter an epic battle of wits and strategy to see who will rise as the ultimate Top Trump! This activity is designed to engage children in a fun and educational way, encouraging them to learn about animals and their habitats while developing strategic thinking skills. The challenges are tailored to be age-appropriate and accessible, ensuring that all participants can enjoy the experience. The event culminates in an exciting showdown where children can test their knowledge and skills against each other.

title: Wild Wonders at Singapore Zoo: Animal Encounters
blurb: Engage in animal encounters and strategic card battles!
description: Embark on a day of animal encounters and strategic card battles at the Singapore Zoo. Children can collect cards and engage in an epic battle of wits to determine the ultimate Top Trump. They will also have the opportunity to design and create their own personal trump card, fueled by imagination and knowledge gathered throughout the day. This experience combines learning about animals with creative activities, making it a fun and educational outing for the whole family. Perfect for kids who love animals and enjoy strategic games.

title: Wild Wonders Singapore Zoo Trump Card Creation
blurb: Design your own animal trump card with wild ideas!
description: Children will use their knowledge to design their own animal trump card, powered by imagination. The activity includes a warm-up trump card battle, an interactive way to learn about the survival traits of animals. This is a creative and educational experience suitable for families and children interested in animals and their unique characteristics. Unleash your creativity and wild ideas!

title: Singapore Zoo Wild Wonders Programme Activities
blurb: Interactive learning about animal survival traits.
description: Engage in interactive activities designed to teach children about the survival traits of animals at the Singapore Zoo. The programme includes a Trump Card Battle, an interactive game to learn about animal survival traits, and a Strategy-Based Mission where participants make thoughtful decisions about location, time, and animal traits to navigate a wild adventure. This family-friendly experience is perfect for kids interested in wildlife and conservation, offering a fun and educational way to explore the animal kingdom and understand the challenges animals face in their natural habitats. Activities are designed to be both entertaining and informative, fostering a deeper appreciation for the natural world.

title: Wild Wonders of Singapore Zoo
blurb: Explore Singapore Zoo with fun challenges and exhibits!
description: Embark on a wild adventure at the Singapore Zoo! Make thoughtful decisions based on location, time, and animal survival traits to navigate the best path. Explore famous and hidden exhibits while completing fun challenges to earn Trump cards. This engaging experience is perfect for families and children who love animals and adventure. Discover the wonders of wildlife and learn about animal adaptations in an interactive and exciting way. Get ready for an unforgettable journey through the Singapore Zoo, filled with exploration and discovery. This activity is designed to be family-friendly and educational, providing a unique opportunity to connect with nature and wildlife.

title: Singapore Zoo Wild Wonders Programme
blurb: Interactive learning about animal survival traits.
description: Engage in a strategy-based mission where thoughtful decisions are made by considering location, time, and the survival traits of animals to find the best path and lead your wild adventure! This family-friendly activity is perfect for children and parents who enjoy learning about animals and their habitats. The programme includes interactive sessions and challenges designed to enhance understanding and appreciation of wildlife. It is an educational experience that combines fun with learning through hands-on activities. Suitable for families with children aged 5 and above, this programme offers a unique opportunity to explore the wonders of the animal kingdom together.

title: Exploring Singapore Zoo with Fun Challenges Await
blurb: Explore exhibits, complete challenges, earn Trump cards!
description: Embark on an exciting adventure at Singapore Zoo! Explore famous and hidden exhibits while completing fun challenges to earn Trump cards. The program includes a mission briefing, warm-up challenges, team strategy sessions, animal missions, and a final showdown with an animal card battle. Participants will also have the opportunity to create their own animal trump card and reflect on their experience. This activity is perfect for families and children who love animals and enjoy interactive learning experiences. Get ready for a day filled with exploration, teamwork, and unforgettable encounters with wildlife.

title: Wild Wonders Singapore Zoo Adventure Program
blurb: Explore animal missions and card battles at ZooSchool!
description: Embark on an exciting adventure at the Singapore Zoo with the Wild Wonders program! Perfect for families and children who love animals and interactive challenges. The program includes a mission briefing, warm-up challenges, team strategy sessions, and exploration of animal exhibits. Participants will engage in animal missions, a final showdown with an animal card battle at ZooSchool, and create their own animal trump card. This program offers a unique blend of education and fun, encouraging teamwork and appreciation for wildlife. Suitable for children aged 7-12, this immersive experience promises an unforgettable day at the zoo. The program is designed to be family-friendly, with activities that cater to different learning styles and interests. Parents are welcome to participate alongside their children, fostering a shared love for animals and nature. The program aims to inspire the next generation of wildlife enthusiasts and conservationists through engaging and hands-on activities.

title: Wild Wonders Singapore Zoo Programme at ZooSchool
blurb: Explore nature with ZooSchool's Wild Wonders programme.
description: The Wild Wonders programme at ZooSchool offers children an immersive experience in nature. Activities may vary due to unforeseen circumstances. Meals are not provided, but children can bring their own snacks. Please inform ZooSchool if your child or a household member is recovering from a contagious illness. Instructors may refuse participation to any child who appears unwell. Park admission is not included in the programme price and must be purchased separately.

title: Wild Wonders at Singapore Zoo
blurb: Explore the wonders of wildlife at Singapore Zoo.
description: Embark on an educational adventure at the Singapore Zoo! This program offers children an immersive experience to learn about animals and their habitats. Activities include guided tours, interactive sessions, and opportunities to observe animals up close. Children will discover fascinating facts about wildlife conservation and the importance of protecting our planet. This program is designed for families and children who are passionate about animals and nature. Please note that park admission is not included in the program fee and must be purchased separately. Meals are not provided, so children may bring their own snacks.

title: Singapore Zoo Wild Wonders Programme Information
blurb: Meeting and dismissal points at parks/ZooSchool.
description: The Wild Wonders programme provides an engaging and educational experience at the Singapore Zoo. Meeting and dismissal points are located at the respective parks or ZooSchool premises, as detailed in the programme outline. Meals are not provided, but children are welcome to bring their own snacks. This programme offers a unique opportunity for children to learn about wildlife and conservation in an immersive environment. Activities are designed to be both fun and educational, catering to a range of interests and age groups. The programme aims to foster a deeper appreciation for the natural world and the importance of protecting it for future generations. It is a family-friendly activity that encourages learning and exploration.

title: Wild Wonders at Singapore Zoo Programme Venue
blurb: Explore the wonders of wildlife at Singapore Zoo.
description: This programme at Singapore Zoo offers an immersive experience into the world of animals and their habitats. Children can engage in various activities designed to educate and entertain, fostering a deeper appreciation for wildlife conservation. Activities may include guided tours, interactive exhibits, and hands-on learning experiences. The programme is designed to be family-friendly, catering to children of various age groups. Note that meals are not provided, and participants are encouraged to bring their own snacks. In the event of unforeseen circumstances, there may be slight variations to the camp activities. This venue provides a unique opportunity for families to connect with nature and learn about the importance of protecting our planet's biodiversity.

title: Wild Wonders Singapore Zoo Programme Activities
blurb: Programme and Activities at Singapore Zoo.
description: Explore the wonders of wildlife through our engaging programme and activities at the Singapore Zoo. Our offerings are designed to provide an immersive and educational experience for families and children of all ages. Discover fascinating animal facts, participate in interactive sessions, and create unforgettable memories. Please note that in the event of unforeseen circumstances, there may be slight variations to the camp activities. We prioritize the health and safety of all children and staff at ZooSchool. We kindly ask parents to inform us immediately if their child or any household member is recovering from a contagious illness. Instructors reserve the right to refuse participation to any child who appears visibly unwell on the day of camp.

title: Wild Wonders Singapore Zoo Programme Overview
blurb: Health and safety guidelines for ZooSchool participants.
description: To ensure the health and safety of all children and staff at ZooSchool, we kindly ask parents to inform us immediately if their child or any household member is recovering from a contagious illness. Instructors reserve the right to refuse participation to any child who appears visibly unwell on the day of camp. This programme prioritizes the well-being of all participants by implementing strict health protocols and guidelines. Parents are expected to cooperate fully in disclosing any relevant health information to maintain a safe and healthy environment for everyone involved in ZooSchool activities.

title: Singapore Zoo Park Admission for a Wild Day Out
blurb: Explore diverse wildlife in naturalistic habitats.
description: Embark on an immersive wildlife adventure at Singapore Zoo, home to a diverse array of animals from around the globe. Wander through naturalistic habitats and observe fascinating creatures up close. Discover the wonders of the animal kingdom with interactive exhibits and educational presentations. Perfect for families and wildlife enthusiasts of all ages, Singapore Zoo offers an unforgettable experience filled with discovery and appreciation for nature's beauty. Enjoy the opportunity to learn about conservation efforts and connect with wildlife in a meaningful way. The zoo features various zones showcasing animals from different regions, including the Fragile Forest, Reptile Garden, and Primate Kingdom. Family-friendly amenities and dining options are available throughout the park.
